titleNullable: MarketWatch News Links and Prices for NASDAQ100
subtitleNullable: MarketWatch News Links, Stock Prices and Polarity Scores of Articles
descriptionNullable: URL links of news articles from MarketWatch dated from Jan 1, 2017, to May 1, 2021, for NASDAQ100 companies. It includes URLs, article dates, sentiment scores, stock symbols, stock prices on, before and after the article date, and stock returns.
